titles.title: A bill to amend Title XVIII of the Social Security Act, to allow Medicare coverage for all clinical diagnostic laboratory services.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 9/7/1988--Introduced. Amends part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require that Medicare payment for a clinical diagnostic laboratory test performed by a laboratory which is independent of a physician's office or a rural health clinic only be made on the basis of an assignment.
